attributes.action: Sign Up To Stop The Creation Of Pointless And Repetative Petitions On This Web Site
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: What a waste of a potentially good service. How can we expect anyone to listen to our protests if people are creating pointless petitions from minorities who are simply using the service as a soap box.

rejection.details: Comments on the epetitions system should be sent to team@petitions.pm.gov.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
